projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.desc: The is an e-commerce website which was JavaScript End-Of-Module-Project. It includes a modern, responsive design that is optimized for mobile devices and tablets.

projects.name: Calculator Task
projects.desc: This is a calculator task created using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, it has basic functions of a calculator, it has a clear display area to show the results of calculations.

projects.name: BMI-Calculator Task
projects.desc: This BMI calculator include two text boxes for entering height and weight, as well as button for submitting the data.

projects.name: To Do List
projects.desc: This is a second JavaScript task whereby I had to create a To Do List using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.desc: This temperature converter allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius and Fahrenheit scales. The UI is easy-to-use for all types of users.

projects.name: Book Store
projects.desc: This was a practice for the JavaScript-End-Of-Module Project and the site is user friendly.

projects.name: First Portfolio Website
projects.desc: This was my first portfolio created using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Class List Table
projects.desc: This was my first project that I did using HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Vue.Js E-Commerce Replication
projects.desc: This was a Vue.Js practice whereby you had to a replication of your e-commerce website using Vue.Js.

testimonials.name: Liyabona Mxhalisa
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Inam has been a pleasure. His attitude towards his work and commitment to continually learn new things makes him a good fit to have in ones team. His confidence is contagious and he is well suited for any environments.

testimonials.name: Okuhle Gxotiwe
testimonials.testimonial: He is very diligent with his work ,creative and shares honest feedback.

testimonials.name: Waydin Jochem
testimonials.testimonial: Inam is an enthusiastic person, who is always willing to improve upon his mistakes. He's constantly interacting with other people, learning different skills each day and often-times shares he's skills with he's colleagues at work. There's hardly ever an unpleasant moment when he's around and he is a constant source of joy in the workplace.

testimonials.name: Sidwell Batyi
testimonials.testimonial: Inam is a confident and enthusiastic young man that enjoys creating and building websites.

testimonials.name: Lisa Mbuwa
testimonials.testimonial: As a web development student, I have been thoroughly impressed with Inam skills and dedication to the craft. His/Her ability to quickly learn and apply new technologies is admirable. Inam attention to detail ensures that every project is executed with precision and meets the highest standards. Inam is a reliable team player who always goes above and beyond to ensure project success. I highly recommend Inam for any ICT company.

testimonials.name: Asiphe Ndimlana
testimonials.testimonial: With a remarkable skill set in IT, Inam is committed to delivering only the best in his work. His unwavering dedication and consistent efforts go beyond what is expected, ensuring projects are completed within set timelines and of superior standards.

education.name: Life Choices Academy
education.desc: I am currently studying Full-Stack Web Development at Life Choices Academy, I am learning a lot about programming at Life Choices and I am above average when it comes to the programming we learn at Life Choices Academy.

education.name: Meadowridge Primary School
education.desc: I went to Meadowridge Primary School, Mitchell's Plain, I never changed a primary school before I went there from grade 1 to grade 7.

education.name: Rhodes High School
education.desc: I went to Rhodes High School, Mowbray for my high school years and their curriculum is designed to provide students with the knowledge, skills and values they need for success in their future academic pursuits. We had highly qualified teachers who are dedicated to helping each student their full potential. I took some extra-curricular activities which was soccer and athletics throughout high school. I obtained a diploma pass in matric last year.
